Text: Which one is this portable ops or solid peace walker

Well, once we take to "reading" we can deduce that the torrent is called Metal Gear Solid.  If any further investigation past that is warranted, the file description speaks of SLUS00594..which, being that the code for PS1 games in the US starts with SLUS.  Need I say more?
Sorry to be a dick.  Just one of those days I  guess..
